title: ClawHub marketplace-wide supply chain compromise (Feb 5 2026)
detail: Koi Security audit found 341 malicious skills out of 2,857 total (11.9%). Attack: fake dep → staging page → obfuscated payload → Atomic Stealer MaaS → harvests Keychain, crypto wallets, Telegram sessions, SSH keys.
